testsuite.name: usedLCV.OP.Acquisition_Quotes_Outright_PCP_used_LCV_with_maintenance_Test

Clicked on Quote button
Selecting used vehicle with registration no. = HK21YPJ and mileage = 10000
Vehicle selected
Paint option has been selected
Interior option has been selected
Acquisition Contract type option = Outright Purchase (OP) has been selected
Customer Contract type option = PCP has been selected
Cost Price ex VAT and RFL from screen is 14041.67
VAT from screen is 2808.33

Cost Price ex VAT and RFL verified and found OK

***********Entered in holding cost page ***********

Changing % CAP Maintenance cost (from test data) to 60
